quotes.message: Youth is such a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Youth comes but once in a lifetime.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Youth is not a time of life, it is a state of mind. You are as old as your doubt, your fear, your despair. The way to keep young is to keep your faith young. Keep your self-confidence young. Keep your hope young.
quotes.name: Luella F. Phean

quotes.message: Youth is about the only thing worth having, and that is about the only thing youth has.
quotes.name: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.message: Youth gets together with their materials to build a bridge to the moon or maybe a palace on earth; then in middle age they decide to build a woodshed with them instead.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: You are only young once, and if you work it right, once is enough.
quotes.name: Joe E. Lewis

quotes.message: We have a powerful potential in our youth, and we must have the courage to change old ideas and practices so that we may direct their power toward good ends.
quotes.name: Mary Mcleod Bethune

quotes.message: Who so neglects learning in his youth loses the past and is dead to the future.
quotes.name: Euripedes

quotes.message: A youth with his first cigar makes himself sick; a youth with his first girl makes everybody sick.
quotes.name: Mary Little

quotes.message: The young do not know enough to be prudent, and therefore they attempt the impossible, and achieve it, generation after generation.
quotes.name: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.message: Youth would be an ideal state if it came a little later in life.
quotes.name: Herbert Henry Asquith

quotes.message: Youth cannot know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young.
quotes.name: J.K Rowling

quotes.message: A sensual and intemperate youth translates into an old worn-out body.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: Youth is to all the glad season of life; but often only by what it hopes, not by what it attains, or what it escapes.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Youth is not a question of years: one is young or old from birth.
quotes.name: Natalie Clifford Barney

quotes.message: Young people are in a condition like permanent intoxication, because youth is sweet and they are growing.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: The deepest definition of youth is life as yet untouched by tragedy.
quotes.name: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.message: Youth is ever apt to judge in haste, and lose the medium in the wild extreme.
quotes.name: Aaron Hill

quotes.message: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of the people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will have truly defeated age.
quotes.name: Sophia Loren

quotes.message: One of the signs of passing youth is the birth of a sense of fellowship with other human beings as we take our place among them.
quotes.name: Virginia Woolf

quotes.message: It is not possible for civilization to flow backward while there is youth in the world. Youth may be headstrong, but it will advance its allotted length.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: If youth is a defect, it is one we outgrow too soon.
quotes.name: Robert Lowell

quotes.message: Use your youth so that you may have comfort to remember it when it has forsaken you, and not sigh and grieve at the account thereof.
quotes.name: Sir Walter Raleigh

quotes.message: A youth is to be regarded with respect.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Youth is, after all, just a moment, but it is the moment, the spark, that you always carry in your heart.
quotes.name: Raisa M. Gorbachev

quotes.message: Well, youth is the period of assumed personalities and disguises. It is the time of the sincerely insincere.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: The Youth of a Nation are the trustees of posterity.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Youth is that period when a young boy knows everything but how to make a living.
quotes.name: Carey Williams

quotes.message: Youth has no age.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: We cannot always build the future for our youth, but we can build our youth for the future.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: The surest way to corrupt a youth is to instruct him to hold in higher esteem those who think alike than those who think differently.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Praise youth and it will prosper.
quotes.name: Irish Proverb

quotes.message: Reckless youth makes rueful age.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Young people need models, not critics.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: Youth is wasted on the young.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: If I have known much trouble in my youth, I have also known much joy.
quotes.name: Clara Schumann

quotes.message: Youth is a period of missed opportunities.
quotes.name: Cyril Connolly

quotes.message: Youth is easily deceived because it is quick to hope.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Youth is wholly experimental.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: Remember now thy Creator in the days of thy youth.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: Youth doesn't need friends - it only needs crowds.
quotes.name: Zelda Fitzgerald

quotes.message: Youth is a disease from which we all recover.
quotes.name: Dorothy Fulheim

quotes.message: Youth is certain what it rejects before it knows what it will accept.
quotes.name: Jean Cocteau

quotes.message: The secret of eternal youth is arrested development.
quotes.name: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quotes.message: Youth is a quality, not a matter of circumstances.
quotes.name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.message: A Church without Youth is a Church without a future. Moreover, Youth without a Church is Youth without a future.
quotes.name: Pope Shenouda Iii

quotes.message: The foundation of every state is the education of its youth.
quotes.name: Diogenes

quotes.message: Youth, which is forgiven everything, forgives itself nothing; age, which forgives itself everything. is forgiven nothing.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: 'Youth is full of pleasance, age is full of care; youth like summer morn, age like winter weather; youth like summer brave, age like winter bare. Youth is full of sport, age's breath is short; youth is nimble, age is lame; youth is hot and bold, age is weak and cold; youth is wild, and age is tame.
quotes.name: William Byrd

quotes.message: Sweet as youth's, and more sufficing than the rank and rare enjoyments of the boy.
quotes.name: Robert Crawford

quotes.message: To the heart of youth the world is a highwayside.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: To fall upon a guiltless youth? For he who such a prize would win.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: So my flowers of youth decay like those that float below.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: Your own fair youth, you care so little for it-- smiling toward Heaven, you would not stay the advances of time and change upon your happiest fancies.
quotes.name: Alice Meynell

quotes.message: She has hope's remedy in being young: when age is on, and life has such a fall, the efficacy has left that medicine which in youth is so vital.
quotes.name: Robert Crawford

quotes.message: When youth has done its tedious vain expense of passions that for ever ebb and flow.
quotes.name: Matthew Arnold

quotes.message: Youth's sway and youth's play, of songs and flowers and love.
quotes.name: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

quotes.message: A boy's will is the wind's will, and the thoughts of youth are long, long thoughts.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Pastimes of youth sometimes among, none can say but necessary.
quotes.name: King of England

quotes.message: The day that youth had died, there came to his grave-side.
quotes.name: Rupert Brooke

quotes.message: Take heed, my dear: youth flies apace; as well as cupid, time is blind.
quotes.name: Matthew Prior

quotes.message: A youth in apparel that glittered went to walk in a grim forest.
quotes.name: Stephen Crane

quotes.message: Today's youth are told to get rich or die trying and they really shouldn't take that attitude forward with them.
quotes.name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.message: The youth is the hope of our future.
quotes.name: Jose Rizal

quotes.message: Old age has its pleasures, which, though different, are not less than the pleasures of youth.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: In youth we learn; in age we understand.
quotes.name: Marie Von Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.message: Youth itself is a talent, a perishable talent.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: Keep true to the dreams of your youth.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: The duty of youth is to challenge corruption.
quotes.name: Kurt Cobain

quotes.message: The youth need to be enabled to become job generators from job seekers.
quotes.name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.message: Everybody's youth is a dream, a form of chemical madness.
quotes.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.message: Youth is a blunder; Manhood a struggle, Old Age a regret.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli
